data.name: Marcus Law
data.title: Leading Tech Companies Join US Responsible AI Programme
data.desc: Companies Including Microsoft, Amazon, IBM, Intel, Meta, Anthropic, Hugging Face, Nvidia and OpenAI Have Joined a US Programme for Responsible AI
